title: Eircom logo
content:
I would like that somebody can help me id the font used for eircom  
 [http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=1&text=eircom](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128184141/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=1&text=eircom "http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=1&text=eircom")

thank you
author: hernando

comments.content: it's custom, designed by Dublin's office of Enterprise IG.
is there a font looks like the font used in eircom?

I was going to edit my post prior to seeing your second question, saying that, since there are only a few letters involved (and obviously the most prominent in the design is the "small cap" "R") any sans like say Legacy Sans Or Ocean Sans would get you there with a couple of tweaks.
